bdomen similar 
to a period pain. This does 
not necessarily mean that 
something is wrong, but if the 
pain is more than discomfort 
or if there is any bleeding, your 
midwife or GP should refer 
you for a scan in the early 
pregnancy assessment unit. 
This scan will show whether 
the pregnancy is growing in 
the uterus. Sometimes you 
need a second scan to check 
that all is well.
Common minor problems
